goals.active: Help Larra rescue Tegwen from the cursed Orrian mirror.
goals.complete: Orr is a dark and ugly place. Tegwen is safe...but we are all greatly sobered by the experience. Is my future truly to defeat the master of that horrible land?

goals.active: Speak to Trahearne and the Pale Tree about Tegwen's rescue.
goals.complete: Although Tegwen is safe, the mirror's visions of Orr have shaken me. It's not just knowing how bad that place is, but also knowing that one day my Wyld Hunt will call me thereâ€”to face Zhaitan himself! I hope I will be ready when that day comes.
